situation:
Heavy Metal Stamping is evaluating a project with a first cost of 500,000 dollars, which is split evenly between 
period 0 and 1. Annual revenues of 120,000 dollars and O & M costs of 30,000 dollars begin at the end of year 2 and 
continue for 10 years. There is no salvage value at the end of 11 years. Using an interest rate of 10%, 
calculate the present worth index.
